name: Rabbit Survival Simulator
description:
Game Summary:

Playing as the rabbit in the Full Moon Valley, you must get enough food, enough sleep, and avoid eating wrong food, stepping on traps, and THAT WOLF. Survive one full year, and you will win!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Space - Sleep/Awake From Sleep

Left Click - Harvest plant/Get Item/Drop Item

Right Click - Eat Food/Plant Seeds

Hint: Remember, harvesting plants that not yet grown to harvestable stage will not drop ANY food or seed at all!

Game Feature:

14 different type of plants that you can find on the map! Harvest them at the right time, eat them, and plant the seed!

Game Map that will change texture base on season!

Day and Night switching that varie base on season!

Random events that RANDOMLY happen and effect the map, and your crops!

Sleep will paralyze you! You cannot wake up until you have enough sleep!

THAT WOLF will track you, chase you, become smarter over time, and HUNT YOU DOWN! (You can hide behinde plants or rocks to avoid being seen)
